title: Manage Rebalancing of a Bike Share System
description: Data shows that all bike share docks in a residential area are full, while docks in the downtown area are empty. An operator must rebalance the system.

tasks.description: Review the bike share system dashboard and identify the stations with 0% and 100% availability.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the imbalance in the system.

tasks.description: Generate a work order for the rebalancing crew.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a task for the field team.

tasks.description: Assign the crew a task to pick up bikes from the full stations and drop them off at the empty stations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent dispatches the crew with specific instructions.
